title: Topic 001 Question 139
body: A Security Engineer has discovered that, although encryption was enabled on the Amazon S3 bucket examplebucket, anyone who has access to the bucket has the ability to retrieve the files. The Engineer wants to limit access to each IAM user can access an assigned folder only.
What should the Security Engineer do to achieve this?
